_comment: Safety layer configuration file. Defines different profiles for robot safety limits.

_comment_block.group_description: Default safety profile for normal operation.
_comment_block.base_orientation_limit_deg: Maximum allowed base tilt (roll/pitch) in degrees before triggering a safety stop.
_comment_block.scale_joint_limit: Multiplier for the physical joint limits from the MuJoCo model. E.g., 0.95 means using 95% of the full range.
_comment_block.scale_torque_limit: Multiplier for the actuator's maximum control torque from the MuJoCo model.
_comment_block.max_position_error_rad: [G1 Specific] Maximum allowed difference between the current and target joint position in a single step (in radians). Prevents sudden large jumps.
_comment_block.torque_static_scale: [G1 Specific] A static scaling factor for torque limits, applied on top of the base limits.
_comment_block.torque_mode_scale: [G1 Specific] An additional scaling factor for torque limits that depends on the safety profile.
_comment_block.joint_limit_static_scale: [G1 Specific] A static scaling factor for joint position limits.
_comment_block.joint_limit_mode_scale: [G1 Specific] An additional scaling factor for joint limits that depends on the safety profile.

_comment_block.group_description: Conservative safety profile with tighter limits, suitable for testing or risky maneuvers. Parameters have the same meaning as in the 'default' profile.
